thread.section_title: FTBbeauty.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FTBbeauty.ca | ftbbeauty.ca
thread.title: Jam Drews.

author: Jam Drews.
title: Jam Drews.
text: I had ordered a stigma brush, and accidentally order 2, however they were sold out. I contacted them via email explaining my problems, I got a very quick and pleasant response back. unfortunately, they did not have the brushes in stock but substituted it with a Belgium bamboo brush that was very similar to the stigma brush for fr yes guys for FREE. All because they were sold out of the brush I had paid for. most companies would give you a refund, but they went out of their way to send me another brush that is similar. I was very satisfied and I will definitely be back for more thank you FTB.
